author: Charley Grant
title: Weight Gain Season for Felines
text:
0 COMMENTS Bring back the fat cats!
Kindred Biosciences , a biotech startup focused on developing medicines for pets, announced on Monday that the Food and Drug Administration has approved Mirataz, a drug that helps manage weight loss in felines.
“Based on our market research, we estimate that veterinarians in the U.S. see as many as 9 million cats each year with unintended weight loss due to various underlying conditions.” CEO Richard Chin said in a press release.
That hefty number suggests a large market opportunity. Of course, Kindred will need to convert optimism into sales if it wants to maintain the momentum in the company’s stock price, which is up about 45% so far this year.
A celebrity pitchman, or better yet pitchcat, might help. There was no word yet as of Monday morning-whether Garfield is available.
